sqlReaderQuery.value:
@concat(' 
DECLARE @s VARCHAR(MAX)
DECLARE @tablename VARCHAR(MAX) = ''', item().Source.TableName,'''
SELECT @s = ISNULL(@s + '', '','''') + ''['' + c.name + '']'' + '' as [''+replace(c.name,'' '',''_'')+''] ''
FROM sys.all_columns c 
join sys.objects t ON c.object_id = t.object_id 
WHERE t.name =  @tablename 
SELECT ''SELECT ', if(greater(length(pipeline().parameters.LimitedLoadTopX),1),concat('TOP ', pipeline().parameters.LimitedLoadTopX),''), ' '' + @s + '' FROM ['' +  @tablename + '']', if(and(greater(length(item().Increment.IdField),1),greater(length(pipeline().parameters.LimitedLoadTopX),1)),concat(' ORDER BY ', item().Increment.IdField, ' DESC'),''),''' as Query')
